page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS - Nth.TAWTON
page.content: {Ted Hughes }is the {Poet Laureate. He was made this in 1984.He lives in the Old Manor House which is known as Court Green in Essington Road, North Tawton. {Jill Tregunna}trained at Hornsey College.She uses sculptoral stone clay.All her pieces are hand built.She fires her own work.Also she makes her own glazes.It was by chance that she found the place here. {John Oakman}is a bronze-founder- sculptor-teacher.He teaches people from all over the world.He works with fibreglass-plaster-bronze and other materials.He has a model that he uses for the classes. {Tony Piper}works in leather.He makes the most beautiful bags and other items.His skilful hands can turn any piece of leather into something wonderful.
